title: Commission Directive 1999/69/EC of 28 June 1999 repealing Directive 93/63/EEC setting out the implementing measures concerning the supervision and monitoring of suppliers and establishments pursuant to Council Directive 91/682/EEC
header:
COMMISSION DIRECTIVE 1999/69/EC
of 28 June 1999
repealing Directive 93/63/EEC setting out the implementing measures concerning the supervision and monitoring of suppliers and establishments pursuant to Council Directive 91/682/EEC
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Directive 93/63/EEC is hereby repealed with effect from 1 July 1999.
This Directive is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 June 1999.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 226, 13.8.1998, p. 16.
(2) OJ L 250, 7.10.1993, p. 31.
(3) OJ L 376, 31.12.1991, p. 21.
